comprehensive_overview: The GNU MPFR (Multiple Precision Floating-Point Reliable) library is a C library for arbitrary-precision arithmetic on floating-point numbers that guarantees correctly rounded results.
core_features: 1. Provides high-precision floating-point computation. 2. Guarantees accurate results with correct rounding. 3. Supports all IEEE 754 floating-point formats. 4. Offers functions for elementary mathematical functions for high precision computation.
